TopicTitle: How Close are YOU to Your Next Reputation Rank?

Articles.Content:
What's the next reputation rank again? ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

Seriously, I'm not kidding, I got lost not too far back... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> 15 haha so i do do intresting stuff ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> (do do ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif))

Best of luck!

So today, someone asked me for the craft file of the ship in the image I posted in this same thread in an "advertising mockery" --- Its the "Shuttle Carrier Aircraft" in my sig - although few guarantees it will fly in 1.0.

48 points until fourth bar.. WAIT I GOT 50 POINTS IN TWO WEEKS?! Holy~~

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-30T02:54:17Z" title="05/30/2015 02:54  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 30, 2015</time> by Columbia**
  
Darn typo, I meant "Shuttle"!

I'm not even sure, I think about 85.

> 
> WAIT I GOT 50 POINTS IN TWO WEEKS?!

![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Far away is my next rep rank.

21 left to go.

55% of my rep came from the iron wars, about 20% from general goofiness, and the other 15% came from this:

> 
> \*Raises peice of toast\*
> Am I doing this correctly?
7 points to go sigh

> 
> 7 points to go sigh

Well don't just stand there! Tell a joke! Do a dance! EAT A BAGEL! I DON'T KNOW, JUST DO SOMETHING.
fiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiine why did the the chicken cross the road?

> 
> fiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiine why did the the chicken cross the road?

To get to the Rep Bar!
He was sad... Alone, and aware of his fate. He knew it would come for him, so he took control, by crossing the road. He wanted to get to... the other side.

Yea two baaaaaaaaars

- - - Updated - - -

and almost 200 posts

Only 44 points till my next bar!

and 42 till my next rank and 500 posts!
Apparently I hit mine not too long ago. I didnt even notice it. Turns out I finally hit my light green rank!
I'm not sure, how do I figure out my exact number of rep points? Thanks.

you have 37 rep ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

200 posts and 100 rep yeah
19 rep to next rank.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
9 Rep points to next rank. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
4 rep points to next rank so close.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Five. Just five.
Since I broke into light green not long ago, I got 153 rep points to go before those light bars start multiplying.
The light green group is a harsh mistress. That being said, 53 to go!
35 more to go for me!
Only 39! Hopefully that goes up a bit when I release Constellation ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
135 to go to 2 light green bars! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Only 39 to go!
